title: Shyvana needs a Dragon Trainer skin.
body:
Shyvana Needs a Skin: "Cannot be trained" Shyvana

I feel like with all of these dragon trainer and dragon slayer skins, THE HALF DRAGON could really do with one.{{champion:102}}

replies.body: the champ that needs a dragon trainer skin the most is kled but he got a dracular skin instead i think shyvana would suit a dark star skin better
